In a message dated 6/24/2001 2:09:04 PM Central Daylight Time, 
dph_of_rules@... writes:

<< Archmages have chain-lightning and it is so badly coded that it isn't 
 funny.  Chain lightning will basically slow down any computer (trust 
 me, I've tried it with 1 ghz and 128 meg of RAM) to a halt if you use 
 it against more than 15-20 opponents. >>

How it slows down your computer I don't know.  I've used chain lighting 
against hundreds of foes at once with a 1.1 ghz with 128 megs of ram without 
any slowdown whatsoever.
